description: Learn how to create your own conversational Bot and publish it online with continuous deployment. Follow me on my personal journey through downloading the tools, building a bot, publishing to Azure, registering, and watching it come to life on a web app service shared with the rest of the world. Attend this presentation to see how you can incorporate MS Bots into a new interactive conversational utility for the next web application generation.
title: Building Bots with Node.js on Microsoft Bot Framework
